desc.p: OKAPI is trying to be as integrated with its main project page (hosted on Google Code) as it cas.

This method retrieves some basic information on a given issue from our project Issue Tracker. In future, it might also return some of the latest comments (we're not yet sure if we want them displayed on our documentation pages).

returns.p: A dictionary of the following structure:

ul.li: id - number of the issue created for this method,
last_updated - datetime string, when the issue was last updated,
url - URL of the issue page,
comment_count - total number of submitted comments.
